oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Allylation of cis-bicyclo(3.3.0)octane 3,7-dione derivatives via fragmentation methodology
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KOTHA, S
SIVAKUMAR, R
MANIVANNAN, E
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: general-approach
radical reactions
organic-synthesis
natural-products
weiss reaction
polyquinenes
(+/-)-gymnomitrol
dodecahedranes
pentaprismane
halides
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: cis-1,5-Dimethyl bicyclo(3.3.0)octane 3,7-dione has been mono and diallylated using allyltributyltin under radical conditions via the corresponding bromo derivatives.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: INDIAN JOURNAL OF CHEMISTRY SECTION B-ORGANIC CHEMISTRY INCLUDING MEDICINAL CHEMISTRY, 40(12), 1245-1247
